parts.text: {"word":"picnic","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"ピクニック、野餐","english_definition":"an outing or meal taken outdoors, typically in a scenic location.","examples":[{"sentence":"We went on a picnic by the river.","translation":"私たちは川辺にピクニックに行った。"},{"sentence":"They packed a picnic lunch to take to the park.","translation":"彼らは公園に持って行くためにピクニックランチを詰めた。"},{"sentence":"The company organized a summer picnic for its employees.","translation":"会社は従業員のために夏のピクニックを企画した。"}],"collocations":["go on a picnic (ピクニックに行く)","have a picnic (ピクニックをする)","picnic basket (ピクニックバスケット)","picnic table (ピクニックテーブル)","picnic lunch (ピクニックランチ)","family picnic (家族ピクニック)","outdoor picnic (屋外ピクニック)"],"synonyms":["outing","excursion","barbecue","cookout","al fresco meal"],"antonyms":["indoor meal","formal dinner"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"ピクニックをする、野餐する","english_definition":"to go on or take part in a picnic.","examples":[{"sentence":"We're planning to picnic in the mountains this weekend.","translation":"今週末は山でピクニックをする予定です。"},{"sentence":"They picnicked by the lake and enjoyed the sunshine.","translation":"彼らは湖畔でピクニックをして、日差しを楽しんだ。"},{"sentence":"Let's picnic somewhere with a nice view.","translation":"景色の良い場所でピクニックをしましょう。"}],"collocations":["picnic by the lake (湖畔でピクニックをする)","picnic in the park (公園でピクニックをする)","picnic on the beach (ビーチでピクニックをする)","picnic with friends (友達とピクニックをする)","picnic lunch (ピクニックランチ)"],"synonyms":["eat outdoors","dine al fresco","have an outing"],"antonyms":["eat indoors"]}],"etymology":{"value":"フランス語の「pique-nique」に由来する。1692年に初めて使用され、元々は「各自が持ち寄った食べ物で気楽に食事をする」という意味だった。語源ははっきりしないが、「piquer」（つつく、つまむ）と「nique」（取るに足らないもの）の組み合わせである可能性がある。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈpɪknɪk/","syllables":"pic-nic"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"picnics","verb_forms":{"present_simple":["picnic","picnics"],"past_simple":"picnicked","past_participle":"picnicked","present_participle":"picnicking"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**picnic**」は、屋外で食事を楽しむ活動を指します。名詞としては、その活動自体や、そのために用意された食事を意味します。動詞としては、「ピクニックをする」という行為を表します。ピクニックは通常、公園、ビーチ、山など、自然の中で行われます。カジュアルでリラックスした雰囲気で行われることが多いです。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I'm going to picnic tomorrow with my family.","correct":"✓ I'm going on a picnic tomorrow with my family. / ✓ I'm going to picnic tomorrow with my family.","note":"「ピクニックに行く」という場合は、名詞を使う場合は "go on a picnic"、動詞を使う場合は "picnic" を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ We had a very good picnic weather.","correct":"✓ We had very good picnic weather. / ✓ We had very good weather for a picnic.","note":"「ピクニックに良い天気」という場合は、"picnic weather" (ピクニックに適した天気) または "weather for a picnic" を使います。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["picnicker (名詞: ピクニックをする人)"],"idioms_phrases":["life is no picnic (人生は楽ではない、苦労の連続である)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"A2","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度 (Medium frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"A2","text":"「**picnic**」は、外でご飯を食べたり、遊んだりすることです。公園や海など、自然の中で食べることが多いです。「Let's have a picnic!（ピクニックに行こう！）」のように使います。食べ物や飲み物を持って、みんなで楽しむことが多いです。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"They spread out the blanket for the **picnic**.","translation":"彼らはピクニックのために毛布を広げた。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"ピクニック"},{"sentence":"We decided to **picnic** by the lake.","translation":"私たちは湖畔でピクニックをすることにした。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"ピクニックをする"},{"sentence":"The **picnic** basket was filled with sandwiches and fruit.","translation":"ピクニックバスケットはサンドイッチと果物でいっぱいだった。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"ピクニック"},{"sentence":"It's a perfect day for a **picnic**.","translation":"今日はピクニックに最適な日だ。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"ピクニック"},{"sentence":"They are **picnicking** in the park.","translation":"彼らは公園でピクニックをしている。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"ピクニックをする"}]}
